text: ICS Bégué is a French private business school in Paris.ICS Bégué à la rencontre des étudiants.. It was created in 1957 and is part of IONIS Education Group.Marc Sellam, « maître » des écoles supérieures privées en France It is recognized by the French State.L’ICS Bégué prépare aux métiers de la comptabilité, et plus encore!ICS BEGUE - l'Institut Commercial Supérieur Bégué ==References== ==Other websites == * ICS Bégué Category:1957 establishments in France Category:Education in France
title: ICS Bégué
